name: Minecraft: The Garden Awakens
description: This eerie new update to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition adds the Pale Garden, the Creaking, and the new Resin block.

name: Dead Land: Polygon VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Fallen Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Go: Dual Destiny
description: The 17th implementation of seasons intersected with the Winter season in Northern Hemisphere and Summer season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the theme of duality and the Pokémon GO Tour: Unova.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Grim Protocols
description:
This update will include:
New Game Mode - Havoc: Think you’ve mastered the threat over Tertium? Think again. Havoc is a new end-game experience that will test the resolve of the most seasoned operative. Be ready to face daunting challenges and earn new cosmetic rewards. We’ve posted an initial dev blog about this, and we’re working on finishing the Q&A post to follow.
New Mission - Dark Communion: Return to the Carnival and explore its darkest corners. Steel yourself as you face hordes of cultists who will stop at nothing to achieve their Dark Communion. We are working on a dev blog for this.
Three New Weapon Families: Tear through waves of enemies by wielding the destructive might of the Two-Handed Force and Power Swords, and the Ogryn Heavy Stubber.

name: Sports Supermarket
description: From Small Shop to Sports Empire – Are You Ready to Rise?

name: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time
description: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time is a strategic card game where players harness iconic characters, creatures, and the mystical forces of the One Power from the legendary fantasy world. Build decks, master unique abilities, and outplay opponents in dynamic, lore-rich battles.

name: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete
description: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete is the offline successor to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp, developed to provide a full, standalone experience. This version retains the core gameplay features of designing your own campsite and talking to villagers, while offering an accessible way for players to experience the game after the original Pocket Camp's End-of-Life.

name: Fallout 76: Gleaming Depths
description: Sin descripción

name: Balium
description: Welcome! We are now going into open beta, free to play. This is a 5 year long project by 1 developer. Local play can be done with up to 4 controllers, or 3 and keyboard/mouse. Internet play has been added, and offers different modes of play like battle royal, timed, etc..

name: Operation Athena
description: Operation Athena is a tactical first person shooter that takes inspiration from classic tactical shooters with updated modern mechanics. Take part as an operator of Athena Team solo or with up to 4 players against a global terrorist threat.

name: A Winter Haunting
description: Everlyn Sterling, a young woman tasked by her grandmother to take care of a historic mansion, finds herself entangled in a mystery involving supernatural forces. Join her in this point-and-click style game to uncover the secrets behind this landmark!

name: One Bear Army
description: You are Bear, a veteran of the elite Navy Bears unit in One Bear Army – a 2.5D action-adventure game in which you will face the evil Professor Rat and his army.

name: Summoners Defense
description: The game features an array of summoning spells, each with distinct strengths and weaknesses. From nimble archers and mighty golems to elemental spirits. As you progress, you'll unlock new spells and master advanced summoning techniques, increasing your arsenal of defenders.

name: Diesel Legacy: The Brazen Age
description: Diesel Legacy is a 2v2 fighting game where four players battle on the same stage at the same time. This unique twist on the traditional fighting game formula adds an entirely new layer of strategy where cooperation will become the key to success. The fate of the city is in your hands!

name: 3D Don't Die Mr Robot
description: Fresh from the Neon Dunjun, Mr. Robot returns in the third dimension!

name: Antonblast
description: Antonblast is a fast-paced explosive action platformer that's all about destruction. Play as the enraged Dynamite Anton (or his cranked-out coworker Annie) and use your Mighty F’n Hammer to demolish bizarre worlds, tussle with screen-filling bosses, and steal your Spirits back from Satan!

name: Snow Bros. Special: Anniversary Edition
description: “It is a modern remake of Snow Bros., an arcade platform-based action game popular in 1990, characterized by its accessibility for people of all ages. It also provides diverse fun with new stages and new modes, and allows players to enjoy the original game as well.”

name: Streamer Mini Games Collection
description: This game allows the streamer's chat members to participate and interact with the game using chat commands. Mini games can be used as community games, during the streamer's breaks or used to participate in the streamer's raffles.

name: Settle and Battle: New Empires
description: A homage to classic real-time strategy games. Gather resources, build an empire, and command powerful armies to conquer the world. Lead six unique tribes, expand your territory, and engage in epic battles with hundreds of units on screen. Dominate in 18 missions and procedurally generated maps!

name: Ruined Nurse
description: Explore the hospital by Thwarting the creatures that are trying to stop you and solving puzzles. Successfully install the internet and surprise customer...

name: Match 'Em
description:
Match 'Em is an action/puzzle game all about the beauty of geometric shape-shifting. Transform your avatar in one of 4 shapes, and color it in one of 4 tints to match the symbols and colors of the obstacles coming towards you and reach the end of the level!

And guess what? You'll get 4 different game modes that each offer a unique take on the concept, a level editor to make and share your very own creations with the rest of the community, and a bunch of granular options to customise the gameplay to your liking :)

name: Paranormal Snap Shot
description: A psychological horror game set in a Japanese school. Trapped in an endless looping building, can you find your way out by photographing all of the anomalies?

name: BubbleBeast DigiDungeon
description: Pop bubbles, fight monsters, and keep rocking to the beat. Get into the flow with unique puzzle-rhythm mechanics across 5 vibrant levels. Match colored bubbles, defuse the Beasts’ attacks, and don't let that combo meter break.

name: Weaveborn Heroes
description: Survive relentless waves and take on powerful bosses every 5 levels! Weaveborn Heroes is a roguelike arena game where each victory brings you closer to becoming unstoppable. Level up, choose from unique spells and passive abilities, and build your hero to beat the final boss!

name: Typo!
description: Defend your computer's firewall in this fast-paced typing game, battling waves of word-based viruses in Endless or Survival mode, where speed and accuracy are your only weapons against defeat.

name: Space Escape
description: A rogue-like arcade shoot-'em-up.

name: Get to Work
description: You are poor and bald. Get to Work.

name: C-Smash VRS: New Dimension
description: C-Smash VRS New Dimension offers a whole new kind of Hybrid Multiplayer, allowing PS5 players to play with other PS5 players, but also across dimensions with PS VR2 players. Fully immersed and physical or in third person, complete with a multitude of accessibility options - a world first for a sports title.

name: Raccoon on a Boat
description: Get unforgettable photos at the ultimate eco-learning park, Raccoons on a Boat. A boat ride at night is always fun.

name: Ani
description: Liam wakes up alone after surgery. He walks around the facility and sees what happened while he was unconscious.

name: MK-Ultra Tower Defense
description: Smite demonic entities with the higher dimensional frequency of your Kundalini energy spiral in this esoteric Tower Defense Roguelike. Expand your consciousness in the fourth dimension and receive the help of higher dimensional entities in order to access the Akashic records.

name: Ocean Planet
description: Ocean Planet takes the ideas & gameplay of "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and treats it as an art form, with atmospheric & immersive visuals and audio. You will be plunged into a diverse aquatic world, and it is up to you to rise up and see what awaits you at the surface.

name: Natures Ascendancy
description: Natures Ascendancy" is an exhilarating open-world survival game where players explore a mysterious alien planet, uncover ancient secrets, and survive its treacherous environments. With stunning visuals and immersive gameplay mechanics, embark on an unforgettable journey of discovery and survival.

name: South Pole Bebop
description:
A multiplayer Into The Breach-inspired turn-based strategy game. It is designed for two players, is set on a 9x9 board where each player controls characters and bases. Each player commands three characters and three bases, aiming to eliminate the opponent's characters or bases while fending off a zombie horde that attacks both players.

Players can create a customizable deck before each game, consisting of three characters and up to 15 unique ability cards that enhance bases and provide special powers to characters. During gameplay, players can purchase ability cards using collectable cores. These cards are limited to those included in the player's deck, which can be modified and reused for subsequent games.

name: Cats Hidden in Christmas
description: Cats Hidden in Christmas is a FREE hidden object game in which you must find 100 cats hidden in a festive, hand-drawn scene. Can you find them all?

name: Shui's Odyssey
description: This is a puzzle game that combines text and images. Players use visual illusions to piece together fragments of memories from Alzheimer's patients, in order to reconstruct the truth of the story and witness the passage of time for three generations.

name: PizzaPanic
description: People are starving for Pizza! Become our new delivery operator. Race through the city with Nip, your trusty courier bot, and bring joy to your customers. Customize your robot and experiment with dozens of unique skills and upgrades. Bring your friends and enjoy chaos in 4 players local-multiplayer.

name: CrabbleUp
description: Dive into an oceanic odyssey, where serene exploration meets thrilling challenges. Embark on a journey through endless underwater mazes, armed only with your cunning and defending yourself from perilous foes with the power of your bubbles.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Creator Pack: Urban Promenades
description: Step into the vibrant heart of city life with the Creator Pack, Urban Promenades. Designed by a beloved Cities: Skylines community creator, this pack invites you to create bustling streetscapes and serene public spaces that pulse with urban energy.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Creator Pack: Modern Architecture
description: Dive into the essentials for city planning of city planning with the Creator Pack, Modern Architecture. Created by one of the Cities: Skylines community's visionary creators, these buildings unlocks a new, contemporary skyline.

name: Crimson Moon
description: When the mystery of the red moon is solved, the story takes off ...... A horror RPG in a strange school, where a high school boy tries to save his sister, but an unexpected truth confronts him...

name: YIIK: I.V
description: YIIK I.V (Intravenous) is a free update which is serves as the definitive edition of YIIK: A Postmodern RPG, originally released in 2019. An unusual error manifests on April 4th, a day that echoes the enigmatic code 404. In a desperate act of innocence, a child relinquishes her name for an invitation to a birthday party, her hope tethered to the faint possibility of finding her brother. Meanwhile, Alex, a recent college graduate, returns home, only to find his reality unspooling like a threadbare tapestry. Guided by a cat which slips through the very fabric of his mind, Alex descends into the depths of his consciousness where he witnesses the impossible: a woman, locked away in an iron maiden, vanishing into thin air. A vision which ignites an undying obsession and threatens to unravel the boundaries of his world.

name: Formula 2D: Steer To Persevere
description: Formula 2D - Steer To Perseveer is a top of the line Formula Racing game where mild similiraties to F1 are entirely coincidental - Create and customize your team - Upgrade your facilities to upgrade the car ️ - Become the world champion and climb the rankings

name: Battle Waves
description: A fast-paced Card Battler with Tower Defense action! Claim victory in the Roguelite Deckbuilder campaign and Online Multiplayer. Collect all the factions to explore thousands of strategic combinations.

name: Remorse
description: Remorse is a first-person psychological horror game. Where you have to get out of an unusual prison, where your jailers are your fears and awakened conscience. But is there a way out of it ...?!

name: Tale of Jade Li Guang
description: Tale of Jade Li Guang is a stand-alone roguelike card game with oriental elements. Gameplay involves constructing your own deck by 5 elements cards, exploring the map, solving random encounters, beating the demon and uncovering the mystery of Li Guang's Kingdom.

name: DoomBreaker
description: DoomBreaker is a hack n slash adventure in a procedurally generated world, accompanied with voice work driven narrative, combat system and more. Rise up and fight against the impending doom that's merging with your world, spreading evil.

name: Bomb Royale
description: Bomb Royale is a game where different bears with unique style try to destroy their opponent by using dynamite and special power in different arenas and try to sit on the throne.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Winter Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Since November
description:
What are you doing with your time on Earth? Are you happy? Stay inside. We have pizza.

"Since November" is a short furry visual novel with about 12k words and four endings. It is written to be conclusive, so there will be no additional chapters. It is a game that was developed for the NovemBear 2024 Furry Visual Novel Jam.

name: Shaki Shaki Island
description: A GB-styled drawing game created for Game Off 2024. Use an 8x8 drawing grid to recreate the wildlife and scenery around you.

name: GoldStorm Pirates
description: GoldStorm Pirates is an immersive two-player shooting game that takes players on a thrilling pirate adventure. Battle hordes of undead pirates and mysterious sea creatures across five challenging levels, each culminating in a monstrous boss fight. Utilise double-handed guns and the iconic helm wheel to navigate the chaos, strategically combine shots for maximum impact, and uncover hidden treasures to power up your efforts. With stunning visuals, a pounding soundtrack, and intense co-op gameplay, GoldStorm Pirates is set to captivate players of all ages!

name: Tetris
description:
Tetris for the Chromatic (an FPGA based Game Boy Color handheld) is a game released on December 1, 2024. It is a Game Boy and Game Boy Color game that is bundled with the Mod Retro Chromatic.

The game features modern and retro game settings, as well as the standard modes: marathon, sprint, ultra, and endless.

Players can customize various options, including toggling the ghost piece, selecting from two speed curves, toggling the hold function, and choosing between the bag or random pieces. Players can input a 9-digit seed to determine piece sequences, or leave it unset for a random seed every game.

Most mechanics follow standard guideline rules. Both IRS (Initial Rotation System) and IHS (Initial Hold System) are present. However, pieces are rotated on the first frame rather than entering pre-rotated, which means they cannot prevent a block out.

name: Tryptic
description: Sin descripción

name: Tile Tales: Pirate
description: Solve logic puzzles while following the journey of a mischievous pirate as he plunders his way across a mysterious secluded island in search of the ultimate treasure!

name: Strong Buy Strong Sell
description: Sin descripción

name: Find Squidward
description: A SpongeBob fangame inspired by the Wanted! minigame from Super Mario 64 DS, but with a few added twists and levels.

name: Chilling Reign
description: A wintery episode for heretic and narratively is a direct sequel to Lost and Forgotten.

name: Snow Way Home
description: A collection of 9 maps by the Waffle House Team that capture the essence of this magical time of year that feature falling snow and slippery ice. ﻿

name: N-Ice Cover
description: N-Ice Cover is a 3D platformer/puzzle game that lets you play as Icy, a cute little ice cube whose goal is to cool down drinks they find there and there. To reach their objective, they'll have to overtake obstacles by placing their unpossessed body as a platform. Will you get your cocktail on this hot summer day?

name: The Protocol Directive
description:
Dive into the dark world of The Protocol Directive, a unique text-based adventure that blends retro charm with modern suspense. As a nameless protagonist, you begin in an ordinary office, but what seems like a normal day quickly turns into a nightmare full of decisions, secrets, and deadly challenges.

After leaving the office, you suddenly find yourself in a dark room. A light flickers on, illuminating a table with an old keyboard. Shortly after, a PC screen comes to life, and a strange force the possessed Protocol begins testing you. Every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death. Find useful (or deceptive) items, solve tricky dilemmas, and try to escape the game alive.

But nothing is as it seems. The deeper you venture into the world of the Protocol, the more reality and dream begin to blur. Is this just a cruel experiment, or are you trapped in a nightmare? Can you unravel the truth before it’s too late?

Are you ready to face the ultimate test? Choose wisely your fate is in your hands.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 1: Demon Hunters
description: Traverse a brand new chapter like never before. New weapons to master, mystical energy to control, powerful demons to slay. Become a Ronin in Chapter 6!

name: Astronaut Adventure
description: The Astronaut's Adventures in the Vast Universe

name: Blade of Dawn
description: This is a third-person hack-and-slash roguelike game. You will play as a Knight of Light defending against the invasion of the Shadow Empire. Using the power of holy light, you can convert shadow-infected enemies into allies. Try to survive until dawn!

name: Sumrak
description: A short visual novel about fear, choice, miracle, adventure, friendship, love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. At the beginning of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of a mini-platformer to find out what happens next.

name: Sinvers on Wheels
description: Crazy racing game where the tracks change every game!

name: 2weistein in Asban
description: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.

name: Minna de Suiri
description: Players throw questions at an AI and deduce the correct answers in this competitive multiplayer game. Compete based on your accuracy rate. Have fun with friends while testing your deductive skills and aim to become the ultimate knowledge champion!

name: Holosaga: Invasion of the HoloX
description: Liberated from the shackles of power, Laplace led the HoloX members and the army to invade Earth! You must gather the members of the HoloLive and stop them.

name: Mine Memory
description: Uncover the skeletons in Hana's closet in "Mine Memory," a gripping psychological visual novel. Dive into Hana's memories, shape her destiny, and confront haunting choices with deep consequences.

name: Cryspace
description: Cryspace is a fresh social media simulator/visual novel with a heavy focus on relationships, dating, and multiple branching paths. Create your profile, connect with friends, and find your way to success, or stumble into despair.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Compatriots Collection
description: Experience Gwen's desperate search for her daughter amidst the undead and other great survival horror nightmares in this jam packed collection!

name: Street Fighter 2
description: Classic mini game, Street Fighter, you will play as an extraordinary martial arts master, fighting against your enemies, upgrading skills, increasing levels, dragging, kicking, sweeping, and charging into the streets

name: Night Shift: Laundry
description: Sin descripción

name: Stranger Watch
description: In 'Stranger Watch' players step into the shoes of an elementary school student in a town plagued by recent sightings of suspicious figures. As they make their way home, it’s up to them to spot and report these lurking dangers

name: Felltarune: Deal or Not Deal
description: Felltarune is an alternate universe of Deltarune. You have the chance to fight Sp4mton or accept his deals... It's all up to you! Don't give up!

name: Alentejo: Tinto's Law
description:
A Gundown Satiric Western, set in the 19th Century Iberian Penisula!

Trains, outlaws, kegs, contraband. Welcome to 19th-century Alentejo, a land where the scorching sun and mysteries are ever-present. Meet Gildo and help him assemble his gang to stand against Baron Tinto's tyrannical rule. Travel across various locations, explore caves and mines, cross the border into Spain, and challenge Tinto and his oppressive lawmaking.

name: Twilight School: The Forbidden Experiment
description:
Three mysterious substitute teachers -Keith, Hayden and Colin- arrive at your academy. But there's more to them than meets the eye-they're all vampires! One day, you uncover their biggest secret yet: the academy is secretly cultivating a rare ingredient essential for a potion Keith is creating that turns vampires into humans.

Caught between these revelations and your growing connection to the vampires, what path will you choose?

name: CatCat
description: Take on a journey with a brave cat! In each level of this adventure, spikes and traps demand insane precision to be overcome. You only have one chance, so if you fail, start over.

name: 2 in 1: Trash Punk & Food Truck Tycoon
description:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!

name: Caretaker: The Bureau
description:
You are the caretaker.
Today is your first day on the job in organization called The Bureau. Your task is to carefully observe and report all anomalies or deviations.

If you do well - a promotion awaits you.
If you don't - The Bureau breaks the contract.

Can you handle this task?

name: After Inc.
description:
Can you rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and 'mini 4X!

Decades after the Necroa Virus ravaged humanity, a few survivors emerge. Build a settlement, explore, scavenge resources and expand as you shape your post-apocalyptic society. The world is green and beautiful but danger lurks in the ruins!

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5: Paint It Doom
description: Brought to you as usual by the good folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone, it's time for Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5! Nineteen maps were made in under 5 hours between November 22 and 24. Enjoy the brief respite before the Christmas season in the best Paint It Doom + Wireframe Texture Pack style. From plenty of doomcute to abstract landscapes, from cozy virtual techbases to all-out slaughtermaps, there's something for everyone.

name: Leucanthemum Eyes
description:
On a rainy day, Daisy went through a tunnel to wait out the rain.
Suddenly she found herself in a place that looked like a sewer, but hellish.
Daisy needs to escape from that place full of ghosts and a beautiful mysterious women.

name: World Drawn
description: World Drawn is a game in which you play as two characters who save a young girl.

name: WooLoop: Advent 2 Pack
description: This Advent 2-themed gallery unlocks 24 additional levels for WooLoop! Working as an advent calendar, open one image per day to count down the days until Christmas!

name: Evercade Alpha Mega Man Bartop Arcade
description: The Evercade Alpha Mega Man Bartop Arcade features an eclectic mix of Capcom classics, including Mega Man: The Power Battle, Mega Man 2: The Power Fighters, Final Fight, Knights of the Round, Carrier Air Wing and Strider.

name: Evercade Alpha Street Fighter Bartop Arcade
description: The Evercade Alpha Street Fighter Bartop Arcade includes six titles from the legendary Street Fighter series by Capcom, including Street Fighter II‘ Champion Edition, Super Street Fighter II Turbo, Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors’ Dreams, Street Fighter Alpha 2, Street Fighter Alpha 3 and Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo.

name: Bigfoot vs. Scots
description: Get ready to experience cryptids, the arcane and a murder mystery with your Bigfoot companion on the isle of Amadan! Using a mix of magic, and an arsenal of weaponry, level up your skill tree. As you and your team mates quest through this open world mystery adventure and earn many many many Haggis.

name: 2089: Space Divided
description: 2089: Space Divided is a classic science fiction real-time strategy game in which you collect resources, build up your base, raise troops and destroy your opponents with tactical finesse.

name: Hordes of Enemies Bundle
description: Hordes of Enemies bundle features dynamic action games where you engage in combat against hordes of enemies.

name: Floria
description: A beautiful Match-3 game with some strategy.

name: We Are Alive
description: We Are Alive is a Co-Op horror game, that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. You are a detective and your mission is to investigate the old psychiatric hospital and find out the truth. Your standard equipment is a flashlight and a gun.

name: One Last Story
description: Do a writer's last words mean anything to the living? A story about death and the (idealization or fear of a possible) future.

name: Cock Fight Simulator
description: Fight as a rooster in a 3D third-person game, equipped with unique weapons in dynamic arenas.

name: Super Mario 64: Gore/Hard-Mode
description: Take a dive into the challenging world of Gore/Hard-Mode! Often called "Real life Mario 64", this mod originally started as a port of Kaze's Unfair Mario 64. It quickly grew into a cursed lovechild between Unfair Mario and 'I Wanna Be The Guy' sporting ridiculous obstacles and gory inspiration from both. Be prepared to die numerous times in unexpected ways!

name: The Anchorite
description: Sin descripción

name: Xiong Chuang Tian Xia
description: Xiong Chuang Tian Xia is a realistic puzzle game set in the Middle Ages. Players will play as a brave warrior, crossing various dangerous levels, challenging powerful bosses, clearing all monsters, and saving people from danger.

name: Draconic Date
description: By invoking the old Dragon Law, you managed to get your dragon girlfriend out for a date. What will you discover in that old abandoned castle, and what bounds will you forge with Iryl?

name: Onibito Kiki
description: Experience ONIBITO KIKI’s first game adaptation in 90s-style 2D action! Play as KIKI, leader of the ONIBITO clan, using special abilities to conquer tough missions. Enjoy retro pixel art combined with modern gameplay—join KIKI on an epic adventure!

name: Flower Power: The Adventures of Magical Plants
description: The story follows Valentina, a brave and curious young girl who discovers a magical garden hidden near her home

name: 2 in 1: Trash Punk & Knights and Guns
description:
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!
Knight in shining armor, fight your way... with Guns!

name: The Sheriff
description: A dynamic hide-and-seek for two players. The Sheriff must find and kill the outlaw before all villagers die. Each round see different powers applied to each player to make each game unique. Pay attention to your back!

name: Just Grill the Steak!
description: This is a game for anyone who just wants to grill a steak. That’s it. You grill steaks. We’ve really focused on getting that jiggly meat texture just right.

name: Best Served Haute
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Letter
description:
"Love letter" is a short, retro inspired, horror game.

You and your classmates went to school at night to break the curse of a ghost girl who is hunting the building.

Run, hide and throw trash cans to survive.
Put the letter together to free her soul.

name: Castle Evalon
description: The thought to be abandoned mysterious Castle Evalon has recently been emitting strange lights and sounds. The most concerning being rumbles from deep underground. Ranger steps through the front doors, only to have them shut tight behind him. Donning his trusty boomstick, he has no choice but to push through.

name: Ham's Kitchen
description:
Embark on a dreamy culinary adventure with our adorable hamster chefs!
Start from a tiny eatery and grow it into a magnificent restaurant in this idle tycoon cooking game!
In 'Ham's Kitchen', cute hamsters serve up a variety of delicious dishes.

name: Dragon of Calon Valley
description:
You get a new job in your grandparents old town, they left you their house, and you're meeting beautiful women at every turn...Nothing could possibly go wrong...right?

Except, it does. Sudden painful, debilitating headaches and getting stabbed in the chest by a would-be assassin are hardly a "normal" first couple of days on the job. All the while, your necklace which you've had since your childhood, seems to be acting strangely...

Discover who tried to murder you and stop them from hurting anyone else while navigating relationships with beautiful women who are more than meets the eye.

name: Deep Horrors of Fishing
description: "Deep Horrors of Fishing" is a fishing game that involves catching monstrous creatures that are lurking beneath. Armed with a fishing rod, bait, and a fragile boat, players must fish up everything in the deep. Players will encounter grotesque fish with their own rarity and items. Will you dare reel these up?

name: Om Nom: Run 2
description: Ready, set, dash! Join the omtastic Om Nom Run 2 challenge and prove you’re the speedster champion.

name: Rage Swarm
description: Step into the swarm and rise as the ultimate survivor!

name: Pool Fever
description: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: TCG Card Market Simulator
description: Create a shop that every TCG fan dreams of visiting!

name: Virgo Versus the Zodiac: Collector's Edition
description:
This Collector’s Edition includes the physical game, Collector’s Box, 55cm Cloth Map, Holographic Stickers, Digital Soundtrack, Shiny Character Cards and Virgo Golden Pin.
Virgo Versus the Zodiac is a sci-fi/fantasy JRPG inspired by the Mario & Luigi RPG series and the Mother RPG series in which you play as an obsessed villain.

The game features traditional turn-based combat with real-time execution of moves: blocking, countering and timing your attacks carefully as well as predicting your foes' moves is essential to succeed in Virgo’s twisted and unforgiving cosmic quest to bring back the Golden Age, a period of peace, symmetry and balance, or so she thinks.

name: Yet Another Climbing Game
description: Yet Another Climbing Game is a punishing ascent, a twisted tribute to the agony of determination. You guide your climber with a single, clumsy mechanic, grappling upward with imprecise precision. That’s all there is. With persistence, you might find yourself soaring, stumbling, and sometimes hanging by a thread. Great mysteries and perhaps some reward await those daring (or foolish) enough to reach the top.

name: Tank vs. Tank
description: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!

name: Shark Simulator: Ocean Predator Survival
description: Hunt, Grow, and Reign Over the Ocean!

name: Dosukoi Slime
description: The player's slime is weak at the start and starts at the bottom of the standings. It is a slime that gradually becomes stronger, and you will move up the rankings. The goal of the game is to become the champion in five seasons. Good luck!

name: Dungeon of Grandmasters
description: You've embarked on an adventure in a cave. Take out all the monsters that will try to defeat you and survive until the end. Dungeon of Grandmasters is a roguelite game that allows you thousands of combinations to defeat the enemies that appear, allowing you to play alone or with friends.

name: Hellgate Senigallia Remake
description: An RPG-infused boomer-shooter with dark and mysterious tones, offering innovative gameplay with a nostalgic nod to the '90s. Get ready to blow everything up and turn enemies into cannon fodder before facing the massive end-level bosses!

name: Oh My Wrench
description:
How long can you survive the road?

In Oh My Wrench, you’ll take the wheel in an endless car-driving adventure where the main goal is to survive as long as possible while dodging unpredictable obstacles. As you progress, the speed increases, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard that now features both all-time and weekly rankings, giving you fresh opportunities to shine every week!

To spice up the challenge, pick up bonuses along the way: grab an extra life to keep going, a time-slowing hourglass to catch your breath, or special coins to boost your score. Combined with a fast-paced day-night cycle and dynamic weather shifts, every moment feels fresh, thrilling, and filled with new surprises.

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!

name: Pet Society Island
description: A Virtual Game Pet Game! Decorate your home, dress your pet, play minigames, decorate your own island! Go fishing, digging and much more!

name: Furious Bikers
description: Tighten up your gloves and warm your engines!

name: Classroom Whispers
description: Classroom Whispers immerses you in the dark hallways of an Argentine school during the night shift, where nothing is as it seems. You take on the role of a janitor who, in the midst of his solitary routine, begins to experience strange events: children appearing in empty classrooms, shadows watching you from the corners, and a growing sense that something is terribly wrong.

name: Archetype and the Four Winds of Hell
description: Master the four elements, and kill demons. In this short Metroidvania, you play as the Archetype, a legendary elemental master, on a mission to close a portal to hell and end a demon invasion. Learn new abilities, fight demons, and if you fail, be reincarnated with mastery of a different element.

name: Toshiue Kanojo
description: Sin descripción

name: Luigi's Lost Levels
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic the Wandering
description: The Lemmings roguelike. Magic the Wandering is a puzzle platformer where you learn spells, discover powerful wizards, and build your party to guide them through the world.

name: BlastLast
description: Old classic Bomber Man in new point of view! Your goal is simple: Blast all enemies by the bombs. Go alone with up to 8 players or assemble the party in online PvP. Choose one of 4 characters, use your specific ultimate, be smart and create strategies to win.

name: 5 Minute Raid
description: A boss raid where the boss is also a player!A team of 3 guardians. 6 classes 12 perksAn abomination from the 3rd dimension, ready to singlehandedly destroy the worldOnly 5 minutes until the destruction of the 2nd dimension!A casual quirky 1 vs 3 asymmetrical PvP experience: 5 Minute Raid!

name: Footage
description: Footage is a psychological horror game focused on searching for loot, evidence and exorcising a ghost.

name: Dark Web: Vigilante
description: You are Vigilantus, a master hacker fighting to fix a rotten society. Immerse yourself in a world ruled by corrupt corporations, politicians, and greedy pharmaceutical companies. Uncover dark political secrets, sabotage systems, redistribute wealth to the poor, and destroy entire corporations.

name: Glitch Blaster's Waifu
description: Welcome to 'Glitch Blaster's Waifu,' the ultimate retro-style shoot 'em up adventure! As an intrepid hacker, you find yourself pitted against a malevolent AI that has kidnapped innocent girls.

name: Seductive Shadows
description: Play as a student at Alfonso University, navigating a world of occult mysteries. Juggle with normal life and learn lustful supernatural abilities with the help of Sally, a Succubus. Manage intimate relationships and uncover secrets linked to your past, all while evading the Underworld's notice.

name: Shlemo
description: Action-packed stories of 3 different guys who kill people to get to a briefcase with supposed wealth. The question is which of them will get it, will it solve their problems, which of them will die and what is in the briefcase?

name: Messorem
description: An emotional journey about death, family and acceptance. Step into this thrilling narrative driven Action-RPG and experience a thrilling combat system and a story tackling deep themes.

name: Necromorphosis
description: In this unliving hell, become the bullet heaven. Gather the bones of fallen foes and morph into the ultimate skeleton to claim your throne of skulls as King of the Undead, if you can survive the Necromorphosis.

name: W.A.N.D. Project
description: Fast-paced, roguelike bullet hell with deep, unique spellcrafting. Create and use overpowered, game-shattering spells by combining a multitude of magical elements. Defend Tokyo from a monstrous invasion using magic, reflexes, and game-changing combos.

name: The Hookmarine
description: What would happen if during an expedition the submarine's engines stopped working and you only had your grappling hook to move and do your work?

name: Mistified
description: Traverse an unknown land, purify the corruption, and salvage the souls of the lost by solving increasingly complex puzzles.

name: Veiled Edge
description: Veiled Edge is a dynamic cyberpunk action-adventure platformer featuring multi-genre gameplay and innovative hacking mechanics. Dive, hack, and adapt your abilities to uncover the secrets of Full-Dive technology in a thrilling journey through virtual worlds.

name: T.I.MO
description: T.I.MO is a 2D puzzles game point and click, where the gamer shall control three characters and according to each way of watching every reality must solve the puzzle (riddles) for helping the monsters for return their homes

name: Robocracy
description: Fight the mad artificial intelligence and save mankind from becoming slaves of robots!

name: Lords of Solgrund
description: Lords of Solgrund combines elements of city building and slow-paced tactical battles. The game features detailed animations and systems inspired by the early middle ages, combined with magical, spiritual and other fantastical elements.

name: Kronostasis
description: A fast paced FPS featuring a time trial based scoreboard. The plot follows a sci-fi/fantasy hybrid story where a time-worn sorcerer boards a mining spacecraft. Crewmembers are being turned into creatures of ancient myth and you, a security robot, must now face these mysterious horrors.

name: Key to Heaven
description: By yourself or with friends, your goal is to fight and explore on the mysterious islands. Become stronger, equip better items, craft a raft and sail parts of the oceans to find more hidden treasure, secrets, and bosses. Beware of other players who are looking to kill you and steal your items.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Storm Chaser Starter Pack
description: The Storm Chaser Starter Pack includes a cosmetic bioluminescent banshee paint override, character set, weapon set and 4,600 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, banshee gear, and more!

name: ReactorX 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Ravenswatch: Legendary Edition
description: Fallen heroes of old folk tales and legends: you are on the verge of a crucial battle against the Nightmare invading and corrupting your world. A roguelike action game by the creators of Curse of the Dead Gods, playable solo or in online co-op.

name: MXGP 24: Fox Holeshot Edition
description: The Fox Holeshot Edition gives you the ultimate game experience, including 4 exclusive Fox suits.

name: 4-in-1 Adventure Bundle
description: Get 4 adventures and experience exciting stories, heartbreak, and pure fun!

name: Akabos
description: Do you hate squares? Then this game is for you! After all, the dog also hates squares. Help the dog to destroy all the squares!

name: Art Spotting Co-op
description: Art Spotting Co-op is a casual game about spotting the difference between several art pieces together with a friend while listening to relaxing music. A controller is not required for local co-op play.

name: Explore Another World Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Anne's Zombie Odyssey
description: Heart-pounding 2D action returns! Play until your fingers hurt and zombie heads explode! Survive while drenched in blood. The bloody feast begins at your fingertips!

name: Fishing Valley
description: Dive into a story-driven fishing adventure!

name: PopSlinger Vol. 1 & 2: Loveless Series Bundle
description: Two anime-inspired 90's musical shooters in one musical bundle!

name: Circle of Sparks
description:
Bringing forth a fusion of Rhythm Games with Decorating - Circle of Sparks allows you to decorate your room, mix and match various decorative themes as you tap your way through the rhythm game, discovering and unlocking songs from an ensemble of artists.

With your party members, experience original, licensed, and even collaboration songs! Adopt pets as you make yourselves at home in the World of Sparks.

name: Clearing Blade
description: Rescue your companions from the battlefield and escape together! Experience the thrilling combat of Roguelite Hack and Slash!

name: Dead By Daylight: Doomed Course
description:
CHAPTER 34: Doomed Course is the thirty-fourth Chapter DLC for Dead by Daylight.
This DLC features the following content: 1 Original Survivor: Taurie Cain, 1 Original Killer: The Houndmaster. The Chapter will release without an accompanying new Map.

name: Data East Arcade 2
description: Data East Arcade 2 brings players 12 more all-action arcade classics from Data East’s extensive back catalogue. Includes the cinematic action of Edward Randy, the prehistoric platforming of Joe & Mac Returns, the offbeat craziness of Trio The Punch: Never Forget Me… and many more!

name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 3
description: Toaplan Arcade 3 for Evercade brings together 7 all-time classic arcade hits from the legendary Japanese developer Toaplan. Discover the origins of the “bullet hell” subgenre with Batsugun and its Special Version variant; run and gun with Out Zone and FixEight; take the controls of the HyperFighter in explosive sequel Truxton II; blast your way through enemies and environments inspired by Indian mythology in Vimana; and bust some blocks with Ghox!

name: JR East Train Simulator: Ome Line - Tachikawa to Okutama: E233-0 Series
description:
The Ōme Line is a 37.2 km long line connecting Tachikawa Station in Tachikawa City, Tōkyō, and Okutama Station in Okutama-town, Nishitama-county, Tōkyō. The line runs through residential areas from Tachikawa Station to Ōme Station, but from Ōme Station onward it runs along the Tama River through the mountains. The area between Ōme Station and Okutama Station is known as the Adventure Line, and although it is in Tōkyō, it is an area where visitors can enjoy abundant nature and activities right after getting off the station.
We hope you will enjoy the Ōme Line, which has two distinctive features a double track running through a residential area and a single track running through the mountains.

name: Ironfall Invasion
description: Join the resistance and reclaim Earth from an army of invaders who won’t go down without a fight!

name: Anime Girls: Graceful Goddess
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Superheroes: Power of New Horizons Legacy
description: In a world where young people with special abilities are trained to become heroes, Kai is a boy who discovers a mysterious power after an unexpected incident.

name: Mario Forever: Community Edition
description:
Mario Forever makes a return with a more polished look, flexible settings and new custom elements! Created on Thunder Engine, Mario Forever - Community Edition aims to bring both the classic feel of the game and a lot of quality of life features and cosmetics, not seen before, to the game.

The game is remade from the ground up, ensuring compatibility + smooth peformance with modern machines and allowing for additional features such as tweaks to the game's style [visually and gameplay wise] as well as extra saving features that can make it more acessible to players.

name: Robobit8
description: Sin descripción

name: On the Stairs
description: Sin descripción

name: Path of The Builder
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn Basic Kanji!!
description: A Kanji learning game which teaches you 80 basic Kanji.

name: Arcade Archives: Fantastic Night Dreams Cotton
description:
" FANTASTIC NIGHT DREAMS COTTOn " is a shooter released by SUCCESS in 1991.
Control the main character, COTTON, and use shots, bombs, and magic to exterminate the beast gods that rule the fairy world with fear.
This shooter boasts gameplay that can be enjoyed by both enthusiasts and beginners.

name: DoomWall
description: Hack your way through the Nex-Us in this turn-based puzzle game. You'll face obstacles like bit barriers, lasers, and digital monsters, all trying to slow you down before the DoomWall catches up and forces you out.

name: Haru no Oto ha Marude Kimi ni Nitete
description: Sin descripción

name: Mistletoe Hotel
description:
Mistletoe Hotel is on sale.
You want to buy the land and build a beautiful wellness resort.
But after learning how much it means to the owner, Nicholas, will you really be able to...?

name: Battlenauts
description: Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of a cosmic struggle. As the commander of Earth's starfleet, you find yourself racing against rival factions to control a newly discovered, mysterious anomaly. This anomaly is the gateway to an entire new solar system and it’s resources, and every decision you make could tip the balance of the galaxy. Prepare for an intense, fast-paced experience that combines strategy, tactical combat, and dynamic multiplayer competition.

name: Eggconsole The Scheme PC-8801mkIISR
description: Unleash your Force and take down the Hellstone Cult! A side-scrolling action RPG with captivating BGM.

name: Fantasy Sword
description: Fantasy action RPG with swords and magic!

name: Beyond Memories: Tale of the Lost Souls
description: Play as a charming Grim Reaper, soaring through colorful skies to free souls and discover 11 heartwarming stories in this peaceful flight adventure.

name: Move Counters That Get More Cursed
description: Move Counters is a puzzle game about moving counters to reach a target score.

name: One Boss One Fight
description: One Boss One Fight is an Action Roguelike game that center around a single epic battle. Many skills to choose from, multiples phases, complex patterns, challenges and more! Step into the arena and face off against Death!

name: Bonnie Blob in Shapeville
description: Welcome to Shapeville, a colorful world filled with friendly shapes and endless fun! Meet Bonnie Blob, a bubbly little hero with a curious mind and a heart full of adventure. Explore the whimsical corners of Shapeville, where every click brings something delightful to life.

name: Vartra Abyss
description: Vartra Abyss is an isometric ARPG that has the player exploring a dystopian underground cavern in search of their lost friend. You must learn to fight using your new abilities that you will attain by slaying enemies. Play your way and mix up your abilities to suit your playstyle.

name: MXGP 24: The Official Game
description:
After a 3-year break, the official game of the MXGP is back. All the official bikes and 20 tracks of the 2024 calendar await to give you the full championship experience.

Play as your favourite riders, such as Jorge Prado, Jeffrey Herlings, Maxime Renaux and Andrea Adamo in the MXGP and MX2 categories. Over 50 riders are available, including those from official teams like Red Bull KTM, Red Bull GasGas, Monster Energy Yamaha, Honda HRC, Kawasaki, Nestaan Husqvarna, Monster Energy Triumph, Fantic and Beta MRT.

The extensive career mode offers full immersion in the championship. Manage the development of your team, schedule and rivalries. Start out as an amateur rider with the aim of being recruited by an MX2 team and, once in the MX2, achieve great results to be selected to join an MXGP team.

By free riding around the 4 km² (1.5 sq. mi.) training area, you can improve your technique and test your bike on six circuits and different terrain types.

MXGP is a realistic game that uses advanced physics to provide intense riding sensations, while offering user-friendly controls to help beginners quickly improve.
And for the more competitive players, the online multiplayer mode lets you compete against the best riders in the world.

name: The Epyx Games: Sports Collection
description: Relive over 50 different athletic and sporting events across eight of Epyx's retro classics in this remastered collection.

name: Water Blast Shooter: Wet Gun
description: Get ready for non-stop action in epic water battles!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Stars Derailed
description:
Version 7.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VI: Wails Stifled by the Silent Shadow
• New Part 2 Open World: Ruimu, The City of Eternal Night
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Thousand-Faced Maestro: Cameo (Sparkle)
• New Crossover Event: Honkai: A Fool's Hand
• New Event: Snazzy Cards Club
• ...and more!

name: Monster Truck Arena: Battle Royale
description: Crush the competition in epic arena battles!

name: Petit Royaume
description: A relaxing, free-building game set in a pixelated 3D environment.

name: Strategy Master
description: What Kind of Card Game Is This? This is a fantasy-themed card battle game where players strategically deploy various card skills to capture strongholds and defeat opponents.

name: Food Courier: Bike Adventure
description: Race the clock and become the ultimate food courier!

name: InoLab Trials
description: InoLab Trials is a multiplayer game where players compete in a series of skill-based trials, either solo or with friends. Customize your character, tackle challenges, and climb the leaderboards.

name: Taito Milestones 3
description:
The collection will include the following 10 titles:
- Bubble Bobble (1986)
- Cadash (1989)
- Champion Wrestler (1989)
- Dead Connection (1992) – First-ever port
- Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2 (1987)
- Rastan Saga (1987)
- Rastan Saga II (1988)
- Runark (1990)
- Thunder Fox (1990)
- Warrior Blade: Rastan Saga Episode III (1991)

name: Pixel Arcade
description: Portal into neon cyberspace in Pixel Arcade. Defy gravity, optimize your strategy, and vault through adrenaline-packed levels. Achieve global dominance in the leaderboard to become a VR champion in the ultimate test of precision and agility.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Secrets of the Spire
description: Engage in epic aerial combat on your banshee to uncover the secrets of this new canyon region and restore the peace before it’s too late! Coming Fall 2024.

name: Heavy Hand: Complete DLC Bundle
description: Elevate your game with the Heavy Hand: Complete DLC Bundle—score 1500 extra coins and unlock 2 new characters for double the adventure!

name: Hole
description: Casual & Hard FPS. Be careful with jam.

name: Toonie Tennis
description: Serve, Smash, Slice, Volley in the ultimate arcade Tennis game!

name: Cricket Legends
description: Simple to play, but Difficult to master authentic Cricket Game

name: Snow Bros. Wonderland
description: Boasting gorgeous 3D isometric graphics, Snow Bros. Wonderland has the brothers defending Snow Land from The Great King of Evil! Armed with an endless supply of ice pellets, gamers can turn monsters into snowballs which can be kicked to destroy a whole horde of enemies! Chain your attacks to defeat several bad guys at once and use your snowball skills to take down massive bosses.

name: Sensei! I Like You So Much!
description: Sensei! I Like You So Much! is a fangirl simulator. Step into the shoes of a passionate fan girl and embark on a journey through the vibrant world of fan culture in this immersive simulation management game.

name: Whistling Waters
description: Catch as many fish on as possible to meet your boss' quota and avoid damaging your steamboat.

name: Cuca: Sharp Bite
description: Cuca has bewitched the Guardians of the forest, turning the animals aggressive. Guide Gracinda, a fearless dog, through a rescue adventure. Explore, avoid the enchanted animals, overcome obstacles, recover lost objects, and free the Guardians to restore balance in the enchanted Paradise.

name: Hare Trigger
description: Play as a bunny with a gun in this fast-paced side-scrolling shooter. Your job? To destroy as many helicopters as you can.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Extra Mission Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 8
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 9
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 10
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 11
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 12
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Additional Character 13
description: Sin descripción

name: OverRider
description: A beat'em up style action game, thrilling, hardcore. You can choose between exploring a cyberpunk city, takeover enemies' bodies; or perform a surgery for implants? You play as a female doctor with a mysterious past, hunting at night in Yayoi City and perform surgeries on day in her clinic.

name: Dungeon Deck
description: Explore a dungeon in the form of a deck of cards! Collect rare items, build your own deck, and defeat the dungeon!

name: Jeepney Simulator 2
description: Embrace your inner jeepney driver once again in the big, bustling streets of Manella City! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this one-of-a-kind driving game. Bring your friends, customize your jeepneys, and face rising quotas. Will you survive? or fade into history?

name: Letalis
description: Letalis presents an unconventional RPG adventure, paying homage to the classics of the Game Boy era while infusing inventive gameplay, souls mechanics and unexpected twists!

name: Origami Treasure
description: Origami Treasure is a 2D platformer, where you are in the role of Papelina, an adventurer in search of the Origami Treasure. Face challenges, obstacles and enemies on this journey with its different folds.

name: Girls & Blocks
description: Pop classic Tetris blocks and meet adorable girls who are very interested in your attention. But you need to put in effort to achieve what you desire.

name: Towercore: Survivors
description: The dark creatures are coming, and you are the only obstacle to stop them. Survive night by night in those monster-infested lands! Towercore: Survivors is a challenging dark fantasy survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

name: Marron's Day
description: Marron's Day is a silly adventure game where you're a bunny! You love your friends but love carrots even more. Explore the town, run errands for your animal friends, and don't let anyone catch you swiping the carrots from the garden (again)!

name: Torque Drift 2
description: From the colourful drift scene of Tokyo streets to professional competitions sponsored by global brands, Torque Drift 2 invokes all aspects of drift culture and offers an experience as diverse and dynamic as the motorsport itself.

name: Madou Monogatari: Fia to Fushigi na Gakkou
description:
An ancient school of sorcery. Where students study true magic and cultivate their ambitions.

Fia, a girl who aims to be a great sorcerer, leaves her hometown and enrolls in an ancient school of sorcery once attended by her grandmother in order to study sorcery.

Surrounded by strict but humorous instructors, and chaotic but amusing classmates, Fia will study sorcery and develop her abilities.

name: Luna's Tale
description: Help Luna in collecting coins, defeating enemies, overcoming hurdles and exploring huge worlds in saving her forest from the evil forces in this classic 3d platformer.

name: ZXC
description: In a small notebook, an abandoned character was drawn without any story. For a long time, the character lived lonely and trapped in the notebook, but one day, the character gathered courage and decided to escape the notebook.

name: Snowdrop the Blade Master
description: It's a deck building roguelike game with a feature, where the card you played leave a shard that can be used as an extra assistance that will help you to reach your goal.

name: LumineNight
description: 'LumineNight' is a mystery adventure game set in the city of Summerset, USA, in the 1950s. It involves detective Kelvin Foster and his only daughter, self-proclaimed detective Selen Foster, unraveling the secrets of a series of unresolved murders over a decade.

name: Sol
description: The sun has been gone for months, but the alarm clock continues to ring every day at 8:00. A visual novel in Catalan.

name: 30 Birds
description:
Experience a seamless blend of 2D and 3D in this mesmerizing narrative adventure, with hand-drawn visuals inspired by Persian miniatures. Wander through the gorgeous neighborhoods of Lantern City while enjoying a ska - dub - reggae inspired soundtrack and help Zig gather thirty charismatic and chatty birds to save Simurgh! But beware, you might come across puzzling challenges on your way…

Discover a gorgeous universe laid out on the surface of rotating lanterns. Wander through a beautiful city inspired by Middle Eastern legends, meeting the local goofs, quirky djinns, and regular weirdos along the way. Solve puzzles and interesting challenges to help Zig rescue Simurgh!

name: Aldriak: The Advent of a New World
description: It's a RPG turn-based strategy game inspired by the first games of the genre but with a new and original mechanic. This mechanic takes the form of 3 distinct rows in which all the fighters are placed. Each skill requires being in a particular row and can only target by following certain rules.

name: Enigma of Fear
description: Become Mia, a paranormal detective searching for her missing father inside the Perimeter - a place that doesn't exist. Investigate clues like a real detective and unravel the mysteries behind the Enigma of Fear, defeating the terrible monsters who'll try to stop you.

name: Pixel Arcade
description: Pixel Arcade is a Virtual Reality platformer set in neon cyber space. Prepare to be transported into a world of pixels in one of the hardest platformers to come to VR.

name: Hell Let Loose: Wacht am Rhein Units
description: Add the Wacht am Rhein Units DLC to your collection and be a part of the battle at Elsenborn Ridge.

name: Fire Emblem: Curse of Lagdou
description: Eight hundred years before Grado’s invasion of Renais, the Lagdou Empire dominates the continent. Powerful mages rule with technology beyond the ken of mortal man. Condemned by the gods, the empire drowns in blood and fire. A curse of the flesh, cast with fear and greed upon the innocent, births a single entity known as the Demon King.

name: Red Panda x Cats Bundle
description: Follow the journey of a gluttonous red panda that is willing to risk everything if it means gettings more food. Walk, jump and slide through a bamboo forest full of traps and dangers until your reach the legendary all you can eat buffet.

name: War Thunder: "Black Friday" Bundle
description:
This pack includes:

Ka-50 "Black Shark" Pack
M18 "Black Cat" Pack
A43 Black Prince Pack
P-61-A11 Black Widow Pack

name: PockeDate!: Pocket Dating Simulator
description: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: A Single Fallen Feather
description:
"The Shadow Over the Sky, Cielvide, had been utterly defeated. But the shadows have started to grow ever deeper of late..."

A Single Fallen Feather is a turn-based RPG where the player creates a party of four out of 12 selectable classes.

name: SokoNature
description: SokoNature is a Sokoban-inspired game with a unique twist. The character and blocks come in three sizes, each interacting differently. Small characters can't push medium or large blocks, while large characters can push all sizes, with larger blocks moving fewer spaces. The game centers on saving the forest from fires, adding a thematic layer to the puzzle-solving mechanics.

name: The Promise of Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Rent a Girlfriend: The Horizon Line and Her in a Swimsuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Sailing the winds
description: An exciting adventure game that combines elements of searching, fishing, and mystery-solving. You play as an adventurer who must help his friend look for his missing father.

name: Headhunters: Bang Bang
description: Modern Gun Fight Strike Games

name: Stellar Verse Pro Runner
description:
Stellar Verse Runner is an infinite runner style game featuring the VTubers from the EN VTuber company, Stellar Verse Productions.

Players unlock the talents by collecting items associated with the talents in the runner mode. Those items can be used in an hatching mode to unlock the talents to use as new characters in the runner mode.

The runner mode has 3 lanes, 3 different heights of obstacles, and accomplishment can be measured be score or distance.

name: Backyard Soccer '98
description: Return to the soccer field with your favorite Backyard athletes! The original Backyard Soccer 1998 is back and now enhanced to run on Steam. Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids. Kick, pass, and score in this classic game that made soccer fun for everyone!

name: FlurryHurry!
description: Survive as long as possible in this DSi-ware-inspired arcade game. Every zone is pseudo-randomly generated, making each run feel unique!

name: CZO Online
description: Combat Zone Operation - This is a dynamic tactical multiplayer first-person shooter.

name: Rough Rivals
description: Experience the perfect blend of American football and bar brawling. Be brutal and cunning, customize your team, upgrade your players, and dominate the field! Challenge your friends in split-screen to relive the joy of couch gaming. May the fiercest one win!

name: Asteroids X
description: More addictive version of 《Asteroids》

name: Weird Wormholes
description: Weird Wormholes is a casual game about traveling through wormholes to try and get back home. Use your ship to mine planets for resources and process these resources into components to enable your travels.

name: Magic and Dragon: 4X Battle
description: Turn-based strategy game in a world filled with magics, demons and dragons! Build, expand, conquer, form alliances and wage wars.

name: Car Guy Soundboard
description: Car Guy meets his new friend Blobinko and the two get into a debate. Car Guy is a short animation I released on April 6, 2022. Year later on November 27, 2024, I woke up with a vivid dream of me creating a Car Guy soundboard. I saw this as a vision and took it upon myself to make my dream into a reality.

name: Ember Storia
description: Ember Storia is a strategic RPG by Square Enix with the character design by Yūsuke Kozaki (Fire Emblem Awakening, Fire Emblem If). The game will be out on PC and Mobile on 27/11/2024 in Japan.

name: The Spearman
description:
The spear is a throwing, piercing or piercing-chopping polearm weapon.
With the help of a spear, a warrior will be able to effectively counter a lot of enemies.
Control the Stickman to throw spears at other stickmans. You will be confronted by many enemies: archers, javelin throwers, armored swordsmen and even magicians.

Simply drag and drop your finger for targeting and throwing.
The power of throwing a spear is always the same, so you only need to aim and specify the direction of the throw.
Enemies die from one hit of a spear in the head and body or from two hits of the spear in the legs.

In the game there is a store with helmets, several defensive skills and an apple for healing.

name: Floor X
description: Floor X is an anomaly hunting game. You need to escape from a surreal office where the space is constantly changing. Take pictures of anomalies, try to survive and reach floor 0.

name: PockeDate!
description: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: Bug-o-Buster
description: Sin descripción

name: Glow Storm
description: Wield a powerful shield in this neon-lit 2D bullet hell where timing is everything. Destroy enemies with strategic shield activations and harvest their sparks as allies. Master the balance between offense and defense in vibrant arenas, then challenge yourself in Hard Mode for the ultimate test.

name: QR Dead
description: Your phone is the key to solving the mystery. Scan QR codes, they hold hidden clues. Find herbs for the infusion to save your grandfather. But be careful. A fog has engulfed the village, and a monster with a crossbow for a hand roams within. You are only safe at the altar. Why is it chasing you?

name: Kassei: Road Cycling
description: Kassei: Road Cycling is a summer sports simulation game. To win the yellow jersey you have to manage your team optimally: as "directeur sportif" you decide on training plans as well as race tactics.

name: Dungeon Flowy
description: An auto-battle hack-and-slash RPG. Assemble a party of six and combine your favorite jobs to aim for the deepest part of the dungeon. Enhance your stats with passive equipment obtained from treasure chests or alter the probability of skill usage. Create your own unique build!

name: Fullbright Presents: Toilet Spiders
description: Eight Legs… Four Eyes… Limitless Terror!

name: Cherry Jump
description: Cherry Jump is a 2D platformer where players race through levels, collecting cherries and aiming for the fastest completion time. The game features multiple paths, achievements to unlock, and various characters to discover. Players test their speed and skill in this fast-paced pixel art world.

name: Dungeons of Dreadrock 2: The Dead King´s Secret
description: Dungeons of Dreadrock - The Dead King's Secret is Part 2 of the (yet unfinished) Dreadrock Trilogy. In this episode you'll puzzle and fight your way through the ancient cavern parts of Dreadrock Mountain. The game features 100 levels, 5 bosses, two different endings and tons of adorable pixel art.

name: The Liminal Dimension
description: You're trapped in an endless loop within a liminal dimension, where each loop leads to increasingly unsettling places. Will you find the way out of this psychological horror? The game offers a unique déjà vu experience that blurs the lines between reality and illusion.

name: Kaimeishi
description: Sin descripción

name: Steam Prison: Beyond The Steam
description: The Heights are a gorgeous utopia. The Depths, a filthy industrial wasteland. Our heroine, raised in the Heights, has nothing but contempt for those below. Now an observation mission requires her to descend into that world, and the gears of fate have begun to turn.

name: Temple of Shadows
description:
Embark on an epic adventure as Sabastian Harrington, a passionate archeology grad student turned explorer, in search of his missing professor. Six weeks ago, Dr. Albert J. Montgomery III announced the discovery of a hidden temple, but he never returned. Now, Sabastian must dive into ancient temple ruins, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets. Will you reveal the mysteries within the Temple of Shadows?

Navigate the enigmatic Temple Ruins and unlock the secrets of the Temple Gate. Venture into the labyrinthine caves beyond, a realm filled with ancient mysteries and hidden dangers. Your mission: uncover the truth and track down the elusive Dr. Montgomery. Embark on this thrilling adventure and face challenges that will test your courage and wits at every turn. Can you reveal the secrets that lie within?

name: The Math Challenge
description: Embark on a thrilling space adventure as an astronaut, where logic and math are your keys to survival. Navigate through challenges, unravel mysteries, and conquer the cosmos.

name: Midori no Kaori
description: Welcome to Midori no Kaori, a relaxing cozy game that allows you to create your own Japanese shop and manage customers. There are no winners or losers here, just unleash your creativity and enjoy a unique experience.

name: Pholee
description: In search of fragments of the past and the future, embark on a journey through photographs that were once created by a great artifact - the Time Camera

name: Foragery
description: Washed up on the shore of an abandoned island, you need to find your way back home. As you explore the top-down 2D world of Foragery, the adventure and story will captivate you. Explore the various buildings and climates on the islands and uncover a story that calls for more than you bargained for.

name: Crystal Breaker
description:
Shoot the enemy at close range! Crystal Breaker is a vertically scrolling shmup that focuses on close range attack.

This game is an aggressive shmup where close range attacks and quick destruction are important for both stage clear and score attacks.

name: Baldr's Squid Isekai: A Parody
description: Baldr’s Squid Isekai is adult parody RPG with lots of cartoon violence and sex!

name: Project Fireball
description: Players, let's team up! Project Fireball is a futuristic fantasy-arcade footbrawl sport where the only rules are those you wish to follow. Join the 2v2 & 3v3 matches, choose your character according to its super ability and be the most skillful, bold and strategic team on the field.

name: Magehunter: Phoenix Flame
description: Stalk the city streets with ancient technology! Will your sword clash with mages, or will you betray your order in exchange for power? Magehunter: Phoenix Flame is a dark fantasy text-based rpg.

name: Farcaster
description: Farcaster is a game that seamlessly blends classic FPS gameplay with thrilling on rails action and wave shooters. Ride flying platforms or paraglides, shoot and kill enemies, dodge bullets from all directions, and run and climb through immersive military bases.

name: Slime Puzzle Story
description: "Slime Puzzle Story" is a puzzle game in which you roll a slime. Move various items in addition to the slime to advance the story of humorous adventures in a mysterious village!

name: Relic Dudes
description: Defeat hordes of enemies, now with your friends! Work together or mess with them on this online multiplayer survivors style roguelike, where you create unique builds that can change the fate of your team.

name: Gooper
description: Gooper is a challenging 2D puzzle game. Work your way through 200 levels with escalating difficulty and mechanics.

name: Charming Blood
description: a visual novel that has many choices that affect not only relationships with girls, but also the fate of the hero. What will be the fate of the young vampire? Will he be able to defend his right to exist, or will he go all out, succumbing to temptation?

name: 3.2m2
description: Don't try to find achievement in this game. Don't try to make something of your life. You are very nothing. if you only know the room you can use and the duties you have, you can clear this game . . . even your ego

name: Hero of the Kingdom: The Lost Tales 3
description:
Experience an adventure full of surprises and save the kingdom from the evil wizard.

The pursuit of the evil wizard Fendrel has led you to an unknown kingdom. The local people live their peaceful lives here, unaware that the evil wizard has returned to their land and is plotting his terrible revenge. A darkness is coming that will engulf the whole kingdom. You can’t let that happen. You must seek out the forces of good and stop the evil wizard. You can count on fortune to favor those who are brave. An adventure full of surprises and heroic deeds awaits you.

Explore the kingdom and stop the evil wizard’s terrible revenge.
Help people and complete many interesting quests.
Fight monsters and learn many skills.
Find hundreds of useful hidden items.
Earn up to 26 achievements.

Play through the third and final episode of the Lost Tales storyline, which takes you right before the events of the original Hero of the Kingdom game. Enjoy a casual and lovely adventuring RPG that features classic story-driven Point&Click exploration in an old-school isometric style. Embark on a journey to explore a beautiful country, help people and complete many interesting quests. Learn skills, trade and collect items in your inventory. Earn nice rewards for your good deeds and achievements. Get ready for a new heroic adventure to stop the evil wizard’s terrible revenge.

name: Golden Spatula
description: Golden Spatula is a champion auto-battler strategy mobile game. It is one of the ‘TFT franchise’ titles together with Teamfight Tactics and Teamfight Tactics Mobile from Riot Games, and is a mobile-exclusive game built primarily with the mobile audience in mind.

name: Runes of Legend
description: Runes of Legend is an immersive pixel adventure game set in a captivating fantasy world filled with mystery and magic. You can step into the role of a courageous adventurer tasked with exploring a once-peaceful land now threatened by the resurgence of dark forces.

name: Intrusive Thoughts
description: A short story that turns everyday tasks into journeys. Can you be the voice that doesn’t let her down?

name: Murder Mystery J: Satsujinhan ha Soba ni iru
description: Everyone is a suspect!? Up to 12 players can compete online! Using the communication function of your device, you can compete online with up to 12 players anytime, anywhere, with anyone, and as many times as you want!

name: On My Way Home
description: You're standing at the bus stop, eager to get home, when suddenly, the unexpected happens. Desperation pushes you to knock on the door of a nearby house, hoping for help, but stepping inside turns out to be a mistake you’ll regret.

name: Ero Mission
description: Adult visual novel about trans woman Samus retiring from bounty hunting. She takes time off to focus on her mental health and adjust her bird hormones, and she has a few sexy rendezvous with familiar space pirates along the way.

name: Neon Blood: Limited Edition
description:
Neon Blood is a neo-noir cyberpunk RPG / Graphic Adventure with a striking 2.5D aesthetic, based on the use of PixelArt 2D sprites with 3D modeled environments. Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure where you will help Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world. In this video game, developed by ChaoticBrain Studios and published by Meridiem, you will experience a variety of puzzles and classic turn-based combat with precise Quick Time Events.
The physical Limited Edition of Neon Blood for PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch includes a metallic textured sleeve, art book, city guide and downloadable soundtrack.

name: Bodycam Unrecord Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Book for Adults 2: Full Version
description: Unleash your creativity with Coloring Book for Adults 2 - Full Version! Explore 15 captivating categories!

name: Coloring Book for Adults 2
description: Color your way to serenity in Coloring Book for Adults 2! Dive into a sea of vibrant shades, paint your stress away, and leaf through nature-inspired pages. From wild creatures to famous masterpieces, it’s time to make your mark!

name: Vesuvius
description: Vesuvius is a single MBF21-compatible map created in commemoration of @AD_79's birthday, based heavily upon the work they did in 2015's "Violence". Many resources from that project have been lifted wholesale, or slightly tweaked for taste. Included is a new palette by Fuzzball, music by Jimmy and AD_79, and a surprise new enemy. A sprawling reactor base featuring over 1200 monsters, all in tightly-wound and highly-calibrated setpiece encounters, along with some nasty incidental traps along the way.

name: Molo's Revenge
description: Molo's Revenge is the incremental journey of a mole dragon to avenge his village by doing the thing he does best: Digging.

name: Planet Miners
description: Control a mining robot and dig for mineral resources on various planets. Transport the valuable ores with your spaceship. Buy or craft upgrades to improve your tools. Defend yourself against the dangers of each planet to mine even the most valuable treasures!

name: Shockman Collection vol. 2
description: ~ Cyber Citizen Shockman 3 + Cyber Citizen Shockman Zero ~

name: Uncle Unco
description: One Fluffy Ball, One Late Bus! A Hyper-Cozy game by @Jonniemadeit

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Hatsune Miku
description: Party as the cheerful Virtual Singer Hatsune Miku, ready to share her love for music with the world!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Godzilla
description: Smash through the competition ad Godzilla, the mighty King of Monsters!

name: Bwirds
description:
A whimsical word game!

Writers are lost for words and need your help spelling new ones. The chef needs spicy words for his cook book. The artist needs colorful language and the naturalist needs wild animal words. Use your grabber contraption to nab bwirds out of the sky to form words and reap the rewards as long as you keep your writers happy.

name: Ravensthorn
description: RPG sandbox taken out from fairytales, myth and folklore. Join and get immersed in a world like no other and pave your own path.

name: Trombone Champ: Unflattened!
description: Trombone Champ: Unflattened will take the charming and quirky gameplay of the original Trombone Champ and bring it to life in a fully immersive virtual reality environment. In this reimagined version, players will honk, blow, and toot their way through over 50 unique songs, all within a vibrant and dynamic 3D space.

name: OnlineCTR
description:
Naughty Dog developed and released one of the greatest arcade racers for the PlayStation 1 known as Crash Team Racing (CTR) in 1999.
