We spent years disassembling the original Naughty Dog assembly/machine code back to C and managed to make it playable online without harming the original gameplay. We also added some new exciting features along the way.

The result is the original CTR game we know and love but finally available to be played with up to 8 players with anyone in the world... online.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Ghostface
description:
Ghostface has been announced as a DLC guest character in the Khaos Reigns expansion for Mortal Kombat 1.
No release date was announced but the expansion will include a 1 week early access period for the character.

name: Critter Café
description: Welcome to your Critter Café! Seek out fantastical Critters in need of your help and build a new home together. Renovate your café, bond with your Critters, and uncover the secrets of mysterious portals to give every Critter a cosy home.

name: House Flipper: Dine Out
description: Take your flipping business to another level with the Dine Out DLC! Create the tastiest interiors with the new furniture grid measurement system! DIY your logo and lease your restaurants to an up-and-coming entrepreneur. Effortlessly prepare dishes with the Universal Cooker - ready to serve!

name: Phyto
description: Grow and evolve 32 different plants in this tower defense! Unlock new skills an units by finding seeds throughout 100 levels. Replay each map as much as possible, to push the challenge and rewards even further!

name: Stellar Realm Voyage
description: A high degree of freedom space shooting game for Spaceship Modular Editing, Like building blocks. Weapon sequence, branching, and inheritance, constructing weapon systems like real magic. Build a unique spaceship and freely form a fleet to battle or pass levels like a meat pigeon.

name: Renaissance Kingdom Wars
description: Battle across Europe, Africa and the Middle East in this grand strategy & RTS hybrid. The year is 1510, you are one of hundreds of landless mercenary captains. Earn the rank of lord and rise up through your Kingdom's hierarchy to be crowned King and expand your Empire.

name: Gladio Mori
description: Gladio Mori is a cutting-edge physics-based multiplayer fighting game where you use razor-sharp weapons to cut down your enemies or die trying. Pick your blade, choose your armour and create a fighting style unique to you. Enter the arena to face your friends or hone your abilities against the AI.

name: Mindlock: The Apartment
description: Colin’s apartment maze has puzzles, dialogues, and some dry humor waiting for you. A surreal adventure of a special kind.

name: New Arc Line
description: Take a stand in the eternal conflict between Arcane Magic and Steampunk Revolution and tip the uneasy balance between sorcery, elves, dwarves and mysterious monsters on one side and steampunk gadgets, zeppelins, and tesla guns on the other in this single-player, party-based, story-rich RPG.

name: Memories: Millennium Girl
description: Memories: Remember Me is an adorable simulator game in a chaotic world! You need to raise your long-lost sister in 8 years, go through numerous endings & experiences throughout this journey! There are over 50 different endings, and you can socialize with and EVEN marry 22 NPCs!

name: Bum Bum Monsterz
description: Bum Bum Monsterz is a 2v2 to 4v4 team-based multiplayer party game! Gather friends for hilarious challenges, tackle obstacles, and solve puzzles. Engage in absurd 20+ minigames, online or locally, with vibrant graphics and silly characters. Get ready for a wild ride and JIGGLY butt-filled madness!

name: Tokyo Waning Moon
description: Tokyo Waning Moon is a two-button survival action in moonlit Tokyo! Slash zombie hordes rushing from left and right - no escape, no retreat! Level up your skills, chase high scores, and conquer time attack challenges!

name: Boardquest: Tales of Liria
description: Lead Orcs, Humans, Elves, or Demons toward victory over Liria in this turn-based strategy for 1-4 players. Advance your skills, wield powerful weapons, and form alliances to defeat your foes. Bring peace over Liria with the solo campaign or face your friends in a local or online multiplayer.

name: Billy Saves the World
description: Run, slide, and Rocket Boost through a scifi-vania platformer, or explore, solve puzzles, and talk to the wacky locals to progress through this comedic love story about becoming a better half, for your other half.

name: Corepunk
description: Corepunk is an MMORPG with fog-of-war in a seamless open world. Thanks to the top-down camera and fog-of-war, you'll want to discover every nook and cranny. Corepunk offers a variety of professions, battlegrounds, challenging monsters in unique camps, guilds, farms, quests, and profound lore.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code Plus ^ Danganronpa 1, 2, V3 Bundle
description:
Bundle includes:
- Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE Plus
- Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc Anniversary Edition
- Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair Anniversary Edition
- Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony Anniversary Edition

name: Gokai Awesome Simulator +
description: Gokai Awesome Simulator + is a premium version of Gokai Awesome Simulator Lite with tons of new content than the original!

name: Meat Girl
description:
Your roommate went missing several months ago.

You finally gain a conscience and go look for her.

You find a strange girl in the woods.

name: Murder Mystery J: Special Stamp - Anna
description: You can add "stamps" to use during battles. You can purchase each character individually. During a battle, you can use your favorite character's impersonation stamp no matter which character you select. *The design may change even after purchase. Please note.

name: Murder Mystery J: SP1 Icon
description: Another version of the character will be available

name: Murder Mystery J: SP2 Icon
description: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

name: Murder Mystery J: Jinrou Judgment - Maru Icon
description: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

description: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

description: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

name: Bible Trivia
description: Sin descripción

name: Orbit Putt
description: Fling golf balls through asteroid belts, wormholes, and tricky gravitational fields in your quest to save the universe from the growing black holes.

name: TCG Card Shop Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Slime Feet
description: Sin descripción

name: Deliverance
description: Deliverance puts you in the role of a delivery driver on a routine night shift. But when one last delivery leads to a shocking twist, you’re trapped in a nightmare. Navigate dark corridors, find hidden objects, and uncover a sinister mystery as you fight to escape.

name: The Strange City
description: Embark on the adventure as Agent G, a lone survivor drawn into a mystery after a brutal car crash. Pursued by relentless monsters and trapped in eerie, shifting environments, you’ll need courage and wit to survive. Can you uncover the secrets at the journey's end—or will the shadows claim you first?

name: Dicey Chess
description: A chess game in which the throw of the dice decides how far you can move.

name: Guidus Zero
description: A real-time grid-based action roguelike game. Explore the sinkhole known as the "Scar" to search for spirits and treasure chests, and defeat the corrupted enemies and bosses as you strive to reach the deepest floor of the Scar, where the source of chaos awaits.

name: Lost But Found
description: A combination of a job simulator & hidden object game. In a top-down table, you are an officer who oversees the lost items in an airport. Organize those items and distribute them to people who lost their belongings. Upgrade your office, manage requests, and more.

name: Ooze Keeper
description: Ooze Keeper is a tactical roguelike that combines monster collecting and resource management. You'll harness the unique abilities of various slimes, construct efficient structures, and optimize resources to grow your farm and earn money with each turn.

name: Master Leaf Blower
description: Master Leaf Blower is a physics-based arcade game with a comic book twist. Become a leaf-blowing hero and save the city! Navigate unique districts, tackle fun challenges, and test your skills in this crazy simulator.

name: Void Dash
description:
A simple endless runner arcade game about dodging dangerous asteroids.

Use powerups to break your highscore and collect Voidbucks to unlock new skins in the shop.

name: Pet Lands
description: Collect quadrillion of coins, hatch pets to mine for you, and unlock 100 unique hand-crafted areas! An incremental clicker/idle creatures-collection adventure. Dopamine heaven has arrived!

name: Vampirii
description: Prowl homes, explore neighborhoods, overcome random encounters, reveal dark secrets, and make difficult choices as a newly-risen vampire in this text-heavy visual novel. Make friends and enemies while surviving this new life in which one night you are the predator, another - the prey.

name: BlackHoleMaze
description: In this game, there are several young people who are very adventure and exploring.They discover a mysterious tunnel and embark on a series of fantastic adventures.

name: Romanizer
description: Immerse yourself in Roman history with this management game! Gain acceptance of the goddess Cybele into the pantheon of Roman gods, influence public opinion, and go through many historical events. Will you be able to get Cybele adopted by the Romans?

name: Christmas Countdown
description: Join Santa's elves in a festive race against time to wrap presents and fill Santa's sleigh before Christmas Eve in this fun and cheerful game for the whole family.

name: Sail the Seas
description: Sail the Seas is a sailing, trading simulator set in 18th century, spanning whole world

name: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th
description: A remaster of the indie-tailored turn-based JRPG with roguelike elements set in a dark fantasy world, where your choices determine how challenging the fights and enemies will be.

name: Hmph! Hmph! Yowai
description: A Singleplayer Guild Battle RPG where you are a guildmaster. Recruit and manage NPC guild members, construct and defend your guild base, and attack other guilds' bases. Expand your resources through trading and completing guild quests. Defeat all the other guilds and become the top guild!

name: Evil Holiday
description: Returning to the parental home and an ordinary holiday dinner turns into a bloody hell filled with horror and death.

name: Ancings: The First Tournament
description: Ancings is a dynamic turn-based strategic fighting video game. As you win battles, you gain levels, new powers and new evolutions. Each enemy is unique, so they all have different attacks and different ways of approaching battle. Plan your strategy well to win.

name: Escape Floor Zero
description:
Trapped in an infinite parking lot, your only escape is through Floor Zero.
Detect subtle anomalies and make crucial decisions in this mind-bending, psychological horror experience.
Dare to escape the unescapable?
If you see an anomaly... turn back.

name: Irritated Mind: Fear of Warehouse
description: After a tragic incident, your relocation to a new city leads you to a warehouse job with chilling twists. Survive 7 grueling work shifts, evade relentless enemy threats, and uncover the mysteries shrouding your character's past, where an intricate narrative unravels amidst retro-inspired graphics.

name: Koloss
description: Enter the arena! Outwit your opponents in fast-paced real-time battles. The makers of Soldiers of Anarchy bring you a real-time multiplayer game that will keep you on your toes. Jump into battle against players from all over the world!

name: Claymores of the Lost Kingdom
description: We blended a Roguelike Deckbuilder with classless RPG progression to give you an open sandbox adventure. Forge your hero and increase your attributes to craft a deck that changes based on your unique build. Level up, hunt bandits, and get strong enough to face the Harbinger of Doom.

name: Nuclear Frost
description: Nuclear Frost is an action-adventure first-person shooter where you have to face the threats that the new world has brought to bear. Fight mutants, keep yourself warm, avoid radiation and fight fungus to save your home.

name: Void Crew
description: Void Crew is a Chaotic, Co-op Roguelite game for 1 to 4 players: Outfit your spaceship and crew for thrilling quests, brave fierce enemies in Space Battles... and try not to panic!

name: Neon Blood
description: The dual Viridis, separated between the luxurious Bright City and the dangerous Blind City, where inequality reigns until you, Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world in this cyberpunk RPG adventure.

name: Poker Knight
description:
Derek, a talented young Poker player, is about to face the biggest challenge of his life when he is transported to another dimension.
There he receives a mission: to find the nine magic amulets that, when put together, have the power to make any wish come true. To accomplish that, our hero will have to face dangerous enemies like goblins, mages, ogres and much more.
The stakes are high, but Derek has an ace up his sleeve: the battlefield is the Poker table!

name: Wild Country
description: Welcome to Wild Country, the cozy-competitive card game with city-building elements. Compete against quirky animals in a competition to become the next Mayor of Sun City. Collect cards, challenge friends and furry foes in the single-player campaign, and play online in ranked and unranked matches.

name: Dungeon of Dark
description: Dungeon of Dark - is a turn-based game about the dungeon with all sorts of enemies, objects and items. Choose a hero and explore the dungeon. Fight many enemies on the 3x3 battlefield and defeat bosses. Use items wisely.

name: Samurise
description: A runner/platformer where play as a samurai trying to save your cat from demons. Your character runs automatically while you control your jumps and attacks.

name: Gorgonia: A Gorgon's Tragedy
description: Gorgonia: A Gorgon's Tragedy is an RPG Maker horror game that reimagines the Gorgons’ origin story, offering a fresh perspective on the ancient myth. Step into the role of Medyuu, a beautiful lamia with unsettling secrets. Her sisters seem to glimpse something different in her—a haunting gaze that pulls her into a path of strange encounters and eerie discoveries.

name: Small Santa Simulator
description: Put items back in their places in a winter wonderland as you try to beat your fastest time. Small Santa Simulator is a 2D platformer where you collect holiday themed items and put them back where they belong. Christmas is soon and everything must be ready for the big day, will you save Christmas?

name: No Space For All
description: No Space For All is a top-down space shooter where you fight against an enemy fleet to claim your place in space. Upgrade your craft by collecting parts from destroyed ships and build the powerful Devastator Project. Follow the story through jokes in chat with your operator.

name: Internet Cafe Manager 2025
description: Sin descripción

name: Steamboat Rescue
description: Take control of a steamboat and rescue animals drowning in the river!

name: Hollow Space
description: Hollow Space is a multiplayer horror FPS game where you play as a mutant or member of the rescue crew.

name: Spirit Level
description: Jump, twirl, and flip your way around this spooky castle! Unlock doors and find your way through this haunted land. Collect all your lost spirit buds, and unlock the mystery of the tower.

name: Arisen Force: Life Devotee of Wukong
description: Enjoy a free-to-play, stylish action combat experience as you explore a chapter storylines from Journey to the West.

name: Bat Bots
description: Enjoy a modern take on timeless arcade action with Bat Bots, a nostalgic shooter inspired by the classics. Take down waves of robotic bats using precise aim and quick reflexes. Engage in solo play, challenge your friends and family, or work together to defend against the oncoming waves.

name: Stones of Flesh
description: Make your way through a land of unknown horrors, where the walls are made of flesh and seem to breathe as one. Defend yourself against the creatures with unique abilities in RPG combat.

name: Little Heroes
description: A real-time strategy game where you build your own army to consolidate your territory.

name: Shopping in a Winter Zombieland
description: An apocalyptic Visual Novel from Zombie Zone Germany for Christmas with German voice acting, lots of decisions and six different endings. There is only a version in German language.

name: Formula Top
description: Fun top-down 3D formula racing game with tense side-by-side battles against competitive AI or other people in online multiplayer. The perfect blend of tight arcade controls and immersive world of formula.

name: Rocket Rush
description: Try, Die, Repeat. In this minimalistic hard platformer you will attempt to traverse a seemingly endless world filled with traps, fire and a bunch of other doo-dads designed and positioned specifically to upset you. Sounds fun, right!

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Anachronistic Collection
description: As the dead rise and dinosaurs feast, you're faced with your last escape in these survival horror nightmares!

name: 250ms
description: 『250ms』 is a platform game that tests the player's reaction speed. The name '250ms' refers to the average human reaction time. Players progress through stages by quickly defeating various enemies.

name: Antarah
description: A heroic journey awaits you with Antarah, the legendary hero and poet of ancient Arabia, Engage in thrilling battles, and fight for love and glory.

name: Zelda: Sands of Time
description: Zelda: Sands of Time is a ROM hack of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (64). It features new worlds, power ups, enemies, story, quality of life improvements and more.

name: Solitomb
description: Use your solitaire skills to assemble powerful combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it to build a set of powerful, synergistic abilities to help you. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Cerulean Tears
description: A vanilla style map map made by FifthElephant and will take 5-10 minutes to complete.

name: Rattle Royale
description: 4 Player Madness!

name: 1-Button platformer
description:
Space is the only button you need

There are 3 levels

If you cannot beat the levels holding shift in the level, select and dragging the red bar off of the levels will unlock them

(you might have to click on the game at the start)

name: Hop Up
description: Sin descripción

name: PrismNeedle
description: PrismNeedle is a Roguelike Survivors game where you can take control of living magical helmets and fight waves of enemies using unique swords and upgrades.

name: Right Turn
description: Challenge your attention to detail and driving skills in this 3D psychological thriller. Spot the anomalies and take a right turn to draw closer to the exit. Fail and be forced to start over!

name: Banana-Clicker
description: Unlock rare banana treasures with every click!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia
description:
Immerse yourself in the serene and satisfying world of Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia, a game designed for relaxation and mental engagement. This virtual jigsaw experience offers thousands of stunning puzzles with themes ranging from scenic landscapes and vibrant wildlife to intricate abstract art.

Choose your difficulty by adjusting the number of pieces, from beginner-friendly sets to expert-level challenges. The game’s intuitive interface makes placing pieces seamless, with features like automatic sorting, hints, and progress tracking. Enjoy soothing background music and customize your workspace for an even more immersive experience.

Jigsaw Puzzle Utopia caters to all puzzle lovers, providing endless hours of calm and joy.

name: Tamagotchi Angel
description: A re-release of the original Tamagotchi Angel, also called "Tamagotchi Angel Gen 3".

name: Mushroom Moonrise
description: Mushroom Moonrise, it's a delightful blend of strategy, art, and serenity. Inspired by the theme 'It's Spreading!', it transforms the subtle art of mushroom growth into an enthralling strategic conquest.

name: Dummy Pirates
description: Dummy Pirates is a 3D Action MOBA game with a third-person perspective set in Planet Chromotica. The entire game operates on a multiplayer system. Using WASD, the player is able to move around and explore different areas of the map (Ocean Tales) and engage in combat. The character faces challenges fighting over the rewards and eliminating the enemy team. Many beneficial collectibles and magical items can be acquired and used to help win the game.

name: Stumble Guys: Astro Sagittarius
description:
Shoot for the stars with Astro Sagittarius! Features 150% more!
Includes:
- Astro Sagittarius Mythic Stumbler
- Strength of Atlas Taunt
- 6250 Gems

name: Monitoring All Night
description: "Monitoring All Night" is a horror-style game in which you report anomalies while performing monitoring duties. Report anomalies appropriately and survive until the end of your shift. And watch out for the aliens.

name: Kota's New Journey
description: An elven sorceress decides to visit her old friend, but gets caught up in a series of exciting (and slightly lewd) adventures, where she finds new friends, rare spells... and loses her swimsuit.

name: Coconut Simulator
description: Coconut Simulator is a game in which you can become a coconut.

name: ROAM: Wild Horse Simulator
description: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Come on,Fantasy baby!
description: Watch out for a heart-throbbing adventure! Let us take you into an ideal world for men, where you can control and save various Korean beauties from different dimensions, each with their own unique style. Every day unfolds an irresistible and exhilarating fantasy life.

name: Mr. Wolf
description: Little red riding hood and wolf are rival

name: Sakura-iro Tetra Prism
description: Sin descripción

name: Totonoi Simulator
description: The Totoi simulator is a simulator to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or bathing in a water bath, The Totoi Simulator is a simulator that allows you to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or taking a water bath.

name: Wind's Poem
description: In this visual novel, you will meet a group of distinct characters with different pasts from the perspective of an ordinary college student - the protagonist Luo Yu, and experience a profound love story, feeling youth and illusion in the university where you are studying.

name: Find Love or Die Trying
description:
Welcome to Find Love or Die Trying, a dating show where ending up single means ending up dead! Will you find love? Or only score a date with death?

Not sure why you'd sign up for this, but now that you're here, you've got 7 days to get
one of the lovely ladies on your tropical island getaway to fall in love with you. If she's
willing to put a ring on it, you're both free to leave.

This version includes both the base game as well as the fan pack.

name: Roam
description: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Rome
description: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: Read Only Memories: Double Pack
description: Dive into the vibrant world of Neo-San Francisco with this Double Pack, featuring "2064: Read Only Memories" and its sequel, "Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER." Includes two downloadable soundtracks inside!

name: Kidname: Iceboy
description: KIDNAME: ICEBOY is a fan-made prequel to the legendary Sierra On-Line title CODENAME: ICEMAN. The prequel follows patriotic child JW as he embarks on the adventure of his young lifetime--a trip to the US Navy's new Submarine Camp program!

name: Locomotive 115
description: It's difficult to know how many locomotives have been swallowed by the suffocating blizzards of the Widow's Run. Cursed with creeping tales of things that lurk in the dark and overshadowed by frequent casualties, it now stands as your only path forward. Will you be able to survive?

name: Buck Blastem
description: Explore large levels. Find gold and artifacts. Buy guns. Earn upgrades. Bring an end to the chaos!

name: Oniriam
description: Sin descripción

name: Arida: Backland's Awakening - Definitive Edition
description: ARIDA: Backland's Awakening. A story of survival and adventure in the brazilian backlands. Face the drought to explore the more arid regions, gather resources and discover clues about the fate of the young Cícera.

name: A Night Duty
description: It is an upcoming horror game developed in South Korea. The player can simulate a night duty as an officer in Korean army base. It is a game that inspired by the game The Exit 8.

name: Void Lands
description: A fast-paced 2D action RPG where you play as a skilled archer battling through intense monster hordes, epic boss fights, and loot-rich arenas. Customize your abilities, find powerful gear, and master dynamic combat in a world filled with endless challenges and upgrades.

name: Hidden Cats of Egypt
description: Discover 100+ hidden cats in ancient Egypt's beautiful scenes. A relaxing hidden object game blending feline charm with Egyptian mystery.

name: Jungle Adventure
description: Dive into Jungle Adventure, a pixel platformer where you explore vibrant jungle landscapes, dodge obstacles, and face off against quirky creatures. Overcome challenging obstacles, battle quirky jungle creatures, and uncover hidden treasures as you progress through vibrant levels. With intuitive controls, retro-style pixel art, and a dynamic soundtrack, each stage offers unique platforming challenges and hidden secrets to discover.

name: Bust a Block 2
description:
From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Bust a Block". In this expansion you can expect 25 new, tricky levels in which the aim is to destroy cleverly arranged blocks with just one shot!

What can you expect in "Bust a Block 2"?

Challenging puzzle gameplay: Every action counts! Find the perfect angle and place your shot strategically to destroy all the blocks at once.

25 cleverly designed levels: Experience an ever-increasing challenge where each level surprises you with increasingly complicated block formations.

Tactics and skill: Think carefully about how you place your shot - one mistake and the blocks will stop! Will you master all the levels?

Can you make the perfect shot and destroy all the blocks in one go? Prove your skill and become the master in "Bust a Block 2"!

name: Hidden Cats: Thief
description: "Hidden Cats : Thief" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find one hundred cute cozy cats located on the map.

name: In Search of the Golden Crops
description: In Search of The Golden Crops is a short game about plant and harvest, use cards, sell your crops, complete tasks on board, upgrade your farm and collect all Golden Crops

name: Keyboard Crush
description: 2D action game where every click determines your survival! Enemy shapes - squares, circles and triangles - drop down from above and it's your job to destroy them before they overwhelm you. Each enemy has its own specific characteristics that force you to be ever vigilant and quick.

name: Isle of Birds
description: Isle of Birds is a cute and cozy Town Builder about populating an island with, well... birds! Place and merge a diverse array of feathered friends to build colourful and varied high-rise bird houses until your island runs out of space!

name: Playing God
description: Speedrun your way across the nine circles of hell through 100 levels in this ultra fast-paced precision platformer, rebelling against the mysterious entity playing god.

name: Cardaire
description: Explore, collect, and build sweet decks. Cardaire is a single-player collectible card RPG. Adventure awaits in the Duelist Frontier, so crack some packs and bring your best deck to take on the challenge.

name: Dungeon Watchers
description: Survive and destroy monsters to your heart's content with the help of powerful and unique characters. Unlock new characters and discover the synergies with their abilities to unleash game-breaking builds and slay everything on your path.

name: Dokimon
description: "Whoa, watch out!" That was close, didn't you know Dokimon are dangerous!?ーStep into Xelos region, where you'll set off on an adventure to uncover the mystery behind your missing childhood friend.

name: Beff Jezos Simulator
description: Beff Jezos Simulator is a simulation that includes all the details of owning an online sales store. Select the products, supply them, put them on sale in your online store and ship the incoming orders.

name: There's No Santa
description: There's no Santa is a hidden object game with a selection of 4 locations and Christmas-themed items to find for each of them.

name: CarX Street: Sunset Speedway
description: The Sunset Speedway DLC offers you new horizons for speed and luxury. The Sunset Speedway racetrack awaits with picturesque views and difficult turns, along with three unique new supercars.

name: On All Clear Days
description: A short visual novel set in the post-war world

name: JoiLab VR
description: joiLAB is an erotic VR game for aim training... however, the aim training part is optional, you can go straight to the Interactive joi (jerk-off instructions) section. The game features fully voiced scenes.

name: Tiny Cats
description: Tiny Cats is a mysterious hidden cat-detective game where you need to find all the hidden and deeply hidden cats in the mansion. Save each cat from the mysterious magic that keeps them trapped inside. And uncover the mystery of your late aunt's house.

name: Crown's Labyrinth
description: Travel through different low poly labyrinths using real time tactics to track down the stolen crown before the monarchy crumbles. Stay one step ahead of the culprit using unique abilities to stun, bait and trap.

name: Bricking Bots
description: Play as a brave little robot in a Retro 3D Collectathon! Solve room-sized physics puzzles, blast villains with your laser, and help your fellow workers rise against your tyrannical BOSS. The more bots you break, the easier each puzzle gets!

name: KartMania Silver
description: Invite your friends to have fun with you playing KartMania! A Kart game where you race around the tracks in the universe of Silver Games games, use and abuse special items to get ahead of your friends and thus win first place! Speed ​​to glory in KartMania Silver!

name: I Wanna Be A Game Dev!
description: Live out your school days as you navigate the rocky world of game development! Can you make an amazing game, or will something get in the way?

name: The Trashcan Games
description: Time for a brain break? Over 25 mini games to cleanse the mind and not think! Glorious Waste Of Your Time Games has a loaded Trash Can waiting for you. Click, reset, done.

name: Prickle
description: Play father hedgehog on a quest to bring his prickly children back home, in this wholesome grid-based puzzle.

name: BlockArena
description: BlockArena is a rogue-lite action game where the player must survive the enemies and defeat them by parrying their attacks. Player can unlock new shields with unique traits and skills. Pick a shield and create your own unique build each run and conquer the BlockArena!

name: Forgotten Mechs
description: Quick mech battle for two players. Choose weapons, explore the map and destroy your opponent.

name: Rogue Survivors
description: Rogue Survivor is a casual top-down shooter game where you try to survive as long as enemy waves finishes. Choose different heroes and different skills to make better builds.

name: Battle For The Hill
description: Battle for the Hill is a free to play browser-website election and political simulator. You play as an American politician, fighting to be elected to office and shape the country with policy and legislation.

name: Hard Chip
description: Hard Chip is a 3D simulation/puzzle/optimization game about building processors focusing on realism. Explore the world of semiconductor chip design and delve into the intricacies of CPU logic, floor planning, and propagation delay.

name: Yuri Sword Saga
description: This is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game set in a beautifully drawn Japanese world where you can slay enemies and bullets with simple controls. Parry enemy attacks and use a variety of special moves to defeat powerful demons and evil monsters.

name: Toastercide
description: You are a Toaster. You have been tasked with eliminating targets by expertly maneuvering into their bathtubs. Use your power cord slow down time, grapple and swing around physics-based environments to execute a Toastercide, all while navigating as fast as possible.

name: Project Aphotic
description: Players assume Lucien's perspective, unraveling the truth behind his coma and amnesia, while cultivating a relationship with Hugh. Throughout the game, choices shape the narrative, leading to diverse storylines and multiple endings.

name: Atlyss
description: Enter the world of ATLYSS, a single-player/online RPG where you can fight with or against friends in a surreal world filled with creatures beyond comprehension. Customize and progress your character(s), complete quests, and discover strange locations.

name: UnDuster
description: UnDuster is a fast-paced ultrafastidious retro platformer combining the skill-based dashing from mountain climbing with unadulterated blasting inspired by the best rocket jumping of the '10s. Make your way through multiple areas with varied challenges and collect their stickers to attain your glory.

name: Scourge of the Village
description: "Scourge Of The Village"is a Chinese folklore horror-themed text decryption game. An ordinary intern reporter, Chen Xi, is investigating a news event about factory sewage discharge, but she somehow fell into the torment of nightmares.

name: Cat's Vote
description: A resource management game where every decision matters. Manage your family's happiness by balancing limited resources and casting votes in unpredictable feline elections. Will the candidate you choose lower prices, or will their promises lead to chaos?

name: Beta Max
description: Use four-dimensional thinking to manipulate time and navigate through this mind bending retro inspired realm. Solve puzzles to help Max find his way home in this atmospheric first-person puzzle platformer.

name: All We Need
description: All You Need is a first-person horror exploration. Uncover supernatural mysteries, face chilling encounters, and navigate haunting landscapes. Unravel the consequences of Jack's fateful decision. Survive the psychological challenges that await. Can you escape the horrors?

name: Sumorbit
description: A physics based fighting game where planets sumo wrestle. Grab with your moon and bounce with your planet to launch opponents out of the solar system.

name: Spirit Mancer
description: Slash, Shoot and Break demons, Capture their spirits and summon them out into your battle in the beautiful yet dangerous world of Inferno, Fight against hordes of demons from Ars Goetia and stop the evil queen with the power of the Spirit Mancer.

name: Quickn
description: Shoot, blast and slash your opponents to win this dynamic top-down shooter in luscious neon colors.

name: Mercury Abbey
description:
The game uses pixel sprites, with characters drawn in a classic American comicbook style. Fossil halls, greenhouses, hedge mazes, botanical gardens, underground cave systems...scenes appear one after another, presenting a visual feast. Unique lighting and shading technology creates an engaging atmosphere and a wonderfully immersive experience.
The game embraces the spirit of early suspense novels, interspersing classic cultural elements throughout the story. Adopting an overhead world view, the world is composed of anthropomorphic animal (furry) characters; the social structures, folklore, and ethnic relations of this world are all waiting to be discovered by players!

name: The Cold White
description: Your fiance Alice and you are an archaeologist in Alaska. Alice ignored you and had an accident during hang gliding. When she reached you via radio, her last words were "They are real"... You have to get into this cold white world to find Alice and solve the mystery.

name: Path of Exile: Liberator of Wraeclast Supporter Pack
description: The Liberator of Wraeclast Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, five Armour Sets, five Back Attachments, two Hideouts, two Portal Effects, seven Hideout Decorations, twelve Weapon Skins, six Pets, a Finisher Effect, a Weapon Effect, a Level-up Effect, five Portrait Frames, five Forum Titles, five Badges, and 3700 Points.

name: Path of Exile: Lord of Ogham Supporter Pack
description: The Lord of Ogham Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, an Armour Set, a Back Attachment, a Portal Effect, a Weapon Skin, two Pets, a Hideout Decoration, a Portrait Frame, a Forum Title, a Badge, and 600 points.

name: Path of Exile: Thaumaturge of the Vaal Supporter Pack
description: The Thaumaturge of the Vaal Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, three Armour Sets, three Back Attachments, a Weapon Effect, six Weapon Skins, four Pets, three Hideout Decorations, a Level-up Effect, a Hideout, a Portal Effect, three Portrait Frames, three Forum Titles, three Badges, and 1500 Points.

name: Path of Exile: Warlord of the Karui Supporter Pack
description: The Warlord of the Karui Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, four Armour Sets, four Back Attachments, a Finisher Effect, five Hideout Decorations, eight Weapon Skins, five Pets, a Weapon Effect, a Level-up Effect, a Hideout, a portal Effect, four Portrait Frames, four Forum Titles, four Badges, and 2200 Points.

name: Path of Exile: King of the Faridun Supporter Pack
description: The King of the Faridun Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, two Armour Sets, two Back Attachments, a Level-up Effect, a Hideout, three Weapon Skins, three Pets, two Hideout Decorations, a Portal Effect, two Portrait Frames, two Forum Titles, two Badges, and 1000 Points.

name: Stellaris: Console Edition - Starter Edition
description: The Stellaris: Console Edition - Starter Edition is crafted to guide you through your first steps in the Stellaris universe, giving you the tools to explore, expand, and conquer as you build your interstellar empire.

name: Beautiful Indie Worlds
description: Get 3 beautiful indie games and enjoy capturing worlds with unique stories.

name: SC Games Triple Bundle
description: This is a bundle featuring 3 casual games developed and published by Synnergy Circle Games for both Windows and Xbox. Take this chance to complete your collection!

name: 2-in-1 Kart Racing Bundle
description: Double the fun with this 2-in-1 Kart Racing Bundle!

name: Irem Collection Volume 1+2
description: Strike yourself the double deal with the Irem Collection Volume 1 & 2 Bundle!

name: Morning Brew: Coffee Shop Management Simulator
description: Run and expand your own cozy restaurant in a peaceful Italian village. Serve bakery items and coffee to customers while customizing and upgrading your space. A relaxing simulation with resource management and building, perfect for stress-free, creative gameplay.

name: Prison X: Chapter 1 - The Devil and The Sun
description: Heavy doors open and you're swept into the surreal world of Prison X, an infamous Bolivian jail in the Neo-Andean underworld. As you navigate amongst devils, saints, wicked characters, corrupt prison guards and even a Western filmmaker; hold onto your soul so La Diabla doesn't snatch it away.

name: Fallen Cage
description: A 3D action game where you control an angel striving to escape from a prison.The objective is to overcome waves of enemies using a variety of firearms and collect six hearts.Engage in combat to reclaim your freedom and take flight once again.

name: 1000 Waves
description: 1000 Waves is a bullet hell arcade game that becomes progressively difficult as you approach the 1000th wave. Strengthen your ship by leveling up and conquer the final boss!

name: Housekeeping to Room 501
description: A work simulator set in an old hotel that is definitely not haunted. Clean the rooms and make sure our guests feel at home!

name: Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle
description: Find shy musician cats and dogs in this charming bundle! Enjoy cozy hidden-object gameplay as you discover adorable animals and create your own musical mix!

name: Wegi
description: Gather around the wegi board with a group of friends on a stormy Halloween night in the late 1980s. What begins as a harmless game soon spirals into a dark, twisted tale of grief, betrayal, and deception. Wegi invites you to experience a short story-driven adventure to uncover secrets with the group and find out what happened to Sarah the night she died.

name: Hentai Girls: Otaku Love
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!
